name: Not your usual unicorn pendant
description:
Unicorns are real. I present to you scientific proof.

The image of several unicorn skulls and horns adorns this unusual pendant.

Hanging next to the clasp is a mother of pearl wishing star.

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

Pendant: 3cm x 4cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/2")

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: A Fine Antler Collection Pendant
description:
Why have just one antler when you can have so many?

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

Pendant: 3cm x 4cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/2")

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Where Did You Get That Hat Pendant
description:
Where did you get that hat Where did you get that tile Isn't it a nobby one And just the proper style I should like to have one Just the same as that Wherever I go they'd shout "Hello" Where did you get that hat.

An elk. In a hat. But where did he get it? Now there's a question...

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

Pendant: 3cm x 4cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/2")

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Please Notice This Owl Necklace
description:
It's that old problem... there's a pink luminous owl in the room and no-one will acknowledge it. Well, no more! Put an end to such tomfoolery with this magnificent and thoroughly sensible necklace.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

The pendant is strung from a deep blue satin ribbon and fastens with a gold and silver plated clasp.

Pendant: 6cm x 3cm (2 1/4" x 1 1/4"), necklace: 45cm (18")

name: Make a Bee Line for the Tea Line Pendant
description:
Make a bee line for the tea line...

This man just can't wait to get his hands on a good cup of tea. Even though he has no hands.

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

Pendant: 4.5cm x 2.5cm (1 3/4" x 1")

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Bee Swift Pendant
description:
You better act quickly if you want this pendant. Get it? Bee Swift?

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

Pendant: 3cm x 4cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/2")

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Two For Joy Magpie Locket
description:
One for sorrow..
Two for joy!

A pair of Magpies you can wear to bring you joy every day.

The magpies image is set under glass for a quality and enduring finish and set into a beautifully detailed silver plated locket.

The locket has wonderful patterns on both the inside and out and has lots of space for a special photograph or secret thing.

Choose from a long or short chain.

Hanging next to the clasp is a tiny little silver plate and glass Mymble's Daughter crow.

Locket: 3cm (1 1/4"), chain: 45cm (18") or 60cm (24")

name: Charles Darwin Necklace
description:
Celebrate the bicentenary of the birth of the greatest naturalist in history with this pendant.

The image is encased under glass and set into a silver plated pendant cup.

The chain is silver plated. Solid sterling silver option available.

Pendant: 2.5cm (1"), chain: 45cm (18")

Add the Transmutation of the Species charm for just £10 more. As seen in the fourth photograph.

The Transmutation of the Species charm is available on its own here.

options.name: Both charms and Sterling Silver Chain

name: The Unusual Salutation Necklace OOAK
description:
Jemima is my name, But oh, I have another; My father alway calls me Meg, And so do Bob and mother; Only my sister, jealous of The strands of my bright hair, 'Jemima - mima - mima!' Calls, mocking, up the stair.

== Walter de la Mare ==

This meticulous copy of a Victorian photograph invokes memories of a forgotten childhood.

The image is encased under a high dome of glass for a quality and enduring finish and has a wonderful weight to it.

The charm is a large two inches tall and hangs from a weighty solid sterling silver chain.

A most unusual and one of a kind piece. No other exists like it. Big and bold and brilliant.

Pendant: 5cm (2"), chain: 60cm (24")

name: The Decision Maker Necklace - Mark IV
description:
Yes or No?

Simply ask your question, spin the disk and wait for it to settle on Yes or No.

The spinning pendant is cast in solid sterling silver. The words are encased under glass for a quality and enduring finish.

The chain is deliberately long so you may ask the Decision Maker questions whilst wearing it.

The pendant itself is around 3cm (1 1/4") tall.

It hangs from a lovely 24 inch solid sterling silver curb chain.

Hanging next to the clasp is a tiny silver plate and glass Mymble's Daughter signature crow tag.

Please note that this piece can be a little stiff to begin with but loosens up over time with wear.

name: Tattooed Lady Pendant
description:
Roll up, roll up... See the amazing tattooed woman. Mrs Gus Wagner!

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

3cm x 4cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/2")

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Cat Thaumatrope Necklace
description:
A Thaumatrope is a two sided disk, usually made of paper, with one part of an image on one side, the other on the reverse. When spun, the two images combine. They were very popular in the Victorian era. If you've seen the Tim Burton film 'Sleepy Hollow', Johnny Depp's character Ichabod Crane has one.

Drawing on this concept, the images here have been encased under thick plastic, framed in gilt and attached to a silver plated chain.

It works just like a regular Thaumatrope; spin the pendant and the cat appears to walk down the avenue of trees!

• Please click here for a demonstration of the concept!

• Browse my other Thaumatrope designs here.

• Gilt pendant and silver plated chain.

Pendant: 2.5cm (1"), chain: 65cm (24")

Hanging next to the clasp is a tiny silver plate and glass Mymble's Daughter crow charm.

This necklace is designed to be long so you can create the illusion whilst you're wearing it. An excellent distraction in a boring class or office!

Whilst this necklace is waterproof to a certain extent, please do not wear it in the shower, expose it to condensation or submerge it in water!

Please note that the materials used to make the pendant are vintage stock and as such you may find some slight imperfections in the surface of the plastic and some unevenness to the metal frame.

This piece is quite light weight and delicate. Please take care whilst wearing it.

Illustration from The Cat Who Walked By Himself by Rudyard Kipling.

name: Bird Watching Notebook
description:
Learn how important eye-strips really are to passerines whilst making your shopping list.

The images are taken from one of my vintage bird books and show three different examples of eye-strips found on British songbirds so you'll never forget again.

The pad has around 50 pages with the same design on each one and is 4 inches x 5 inches in size.

Perfect for all bird watchers!

name: Bird Watching Sticky Post It Notes
description:
Learn the difference between Swallows, House Martins and Sand Martins whilst leaving those useful little notes for yourself and your family.

The image is taken from one of my vintage bird books and shows the three different birds in order of size with their names written along the bottom so you'll never forget again.

These post it notes are so much nicer than the normal boring yellow ones. The pad has around 50 sticky-backed sheets and is 7.5 cm square.

Perfect for all bird watchers!

name: Alice in Wonderland OOAK Necklace
description:
"The table was a large one, but the three were all crowded together at one corner of it: `No room! No room!' they cried out when they saw Alice coming. `There's plenty of room!' said Alice indignantly, and she sat down in a large arm-chair at one end of the table." == Lewis Carroll ==

Look closely at this very special necklace and you will see all the parts of Alice's story... The central pendant pendant holds the image of Alice at the Mad Tea Party. The image is encased under glass for a quality and enduring finish. Hanging beneath the pendant is the little golden key which must be Alice's from the beginning of the story, along with a tiny bird - the one that was so concerned about serpents. In the centre hangs a charming golden rabbit. The White Rabbit, of course. The main pendant is flanked on either side by gold plated leaves. These are highly detailed and patterned on both sides and flutter beautifully when worn.

This necklace has a wonderful weight to it and is perfect for dressing up a casual outfit or as a focal point for that special outfit. It has been created from elements collected over a long period of time from all over the world and I will never be able to repeat this piece again. Don't miss your chance! Materials: All brass and gold plated elements. Glass encases the central image. Main pendant : 3cm (1/4") without embellishments, chain: 45 cm (18")
Illustration by Sir Arthur Rackham

name: Tiny Initial Charm Necklace
description:
A tiny little initial charm for you to wear around your neck. Delicate and personal, this necklace makes the most wonderful and thoughtful gift to another or to yourself.

The charm is made from solid sterling silver with a glass front.

The chain is solid sterling silver.

Charm: 8mm, chain: 45cm (18")

name: The Phantasmagoria Necklace
description:
The marvellous Phantasmagoria was a very early form of cinema whereby a modified magic lantern was used to project images of demons and monsters onto the walls of a darkened rooms for the enjoyment of an 18th century public.

This little skull was one of them. I remember him flitting about the room in the wonderful and now sadly closed Museum of the Moving image in London when I was a child.

The image is a replica of the actual magic lantern slide that was used to project the images. You can see him for yourself in the fourth picture, terrorising 18th century Paris .

The image is encased under glass and set into a silver plated pendant cup.

The chain is silver plated.

Pendant: 2cm (3/4"), chain: 45cm (18")

You can learn all about the Phantasmagoria here.

name: Sleepy Hollow Thaumatrope Necklace
description:
A Thaumatrope is a two sided disk, usually made of paper, with one part of an image on one side, the other on the reverse. When spun, the two images combine. They were very popular in the Victorian era. If you've seen the Tim Burton film 'Sleepy Hollow', Johnny Depp's character Ichabod Crane has one.

Drawing on this concept, the images here have been encased under thick plastic, framed in gilt and attached to a silver plated chain.

It works just like a regular Thaumatrope; spin the pendant and the bird appears inside the cage! Stop the spinning and you will see the bird has cleverly escaped...

• Please click here for a demonstration!

• Browse my other Thaumatrope designs here.

• Gilt pendant and silver plated chain.

Pendant: 2.5cm (1"), chain: 65cm (24")

Hanging next to the clasp is a tiny silver plate and glass Mymble's Daughter crow charm.

This necklace is designed to be long so you can create the illusion whilst you're wearing it. An excellent distraction in a boring class or office!

Whilst this necklace is waterproof to a certain extent, please do not wear it in the shower, expose it to condensation or submerge it in water!

Please note that the materials used to make the pendant are vintage stock and as such you may find some slight imperfections in the surface of the plastic and some unevenness to the metal frame.

This piece is quite light weight and delicate. Please take care whilst wearing it.

name: White Rabbit Alice in Wonderland Necklace
description:
This tiny little White Rabbit holds a message for the Queen of Hearts.

The image is encased under glass and set into a silver plated pendant cup.

The chain is silver plated.

Pendant: 2cm (3/4"), chain: 45cm (18")

name: Virginia Woolf Quote Pendant
description:
Some people go to priests; others to poetry; I to my friends.
~Virginia Woolf

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

3cm x 4cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/2")

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Virginia Woolf Pendant
description:
The eyes of others our prisons; their thoughts our cages.
~Virginia Woolf

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

3cm x 4cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/2")

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Large Virginia Woolf Charm Necklace
description:
As a woman I have no country. As a woman my country is the whole world.
~Virginia Woolf

Celebrate the life of the brilliant authoress, Virginia Woolf with this magnificently oversized charm necklace.

The image is encased under a high dome of glass which enhances the image and allows you to see it from all angles.

The chain and pendant back are silver plated.

Pendant: 5cm (2"), chain: 45cm (18")

name: Black Cat Pendant
description:
The little silhouette of a cat runs across your pendant...

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

3cm x 4cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/2")

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: The Embroiderer's Necklace OOAK
description:
Do you know someone who loves to embroider? Oh course you do! This is the perfect necklace for them...

Each spool of embroidery thread has been individually crafted from real thread with paper wrappers and is a perfect tiny replica of the real thing.

Each spool is individual and there are four of them inside a lovely real glass bottle stopped with a real cork.

The cork can be removed carefully if you want to look at the threads. Otherwise the cork sits snug in the bottle so there's no fear of losing them.

The bottle hangs from a gold plated fixing on a sweetie pink silk ribbon necklace which fastens with a gold plated clasp.

Bottle: 2.5cm (1"), necklace: 45cm (18")

Hanging next to the clasp is a tiny pair of embroidery scissors. Don't worry though. They are just for decoration and don't snip.

I only had enough tiny threads for one necklace so this design will not be repeated and is the only one in the world.

Don't miss your chance to add it to your collection!

description:
A Thaumatrope is a two sided disk, usually made of paper, with one part of an image on one side, the other on the reverse. When spun, the two images combine. They were very popular in the Victorian era. If you've seen the Tim Burton film 'Sleepy Hollow', Johnny Depp's character Ichabod Crane has one.

Drawing on this concept, the images here have been encased under thick plastic, framed in gilt and attached to a silver plated chain.

It works just like a regular Thaumatrope; spin the pendant and the bird appears inside the cage! Stop the spinning and you will see the bird has cleverly escaped...

name: Silver Cat at the Window Pendant
description:
What a peaceful image. Look closely and you will see two figures walking in the autumnal landscape outside...

The image in encased under glass and set into a heavy, silver plated pendant back.

Durable and perfect for every day.

Pendant: 3cm x 3cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/4"), 5mm (1/4") thick.

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Cheshire Cat Necklace
description:
'The Cat only grinned when it saw Alice. It looked good- natured, she thought: still it had very long claws and a great many teeth, so she felt that it ought to be treated with respect.' - Lewis Carroll

The image of the Cheshire Cat is encased under glass in a large silver plated pendant cup and hangs from a silver plated chain.

A tiny charm, also made from glass and silver plate, which reads "smile".

Who could help but smile when faced with a grin like that?

Main pendant: 2.5cm (1"), chain: 45cm (18")

name: The Unimpressed Cat Necklace
description:
This cat doesn't look too impressed. I just love its expression! Perhaps he reminds you of a cat you know...

The image is encased under glass and set into a silver plated pendant cup.

The chain is silver plated.

Pendant: 2cm (3/4"), chain: 45cm (18")

name: The Cat at the Window Pendant
description:
What a peaceful image. Look closely and you will see two figures walking in the autumnal landscape outside...

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

3cm x 4cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/2")

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Fairy Tiffs Necklace
description:
This beautiful drawing is taken from "Peter Pan in Kensington Gardens". The story of how Peter Pan, as a human baby, decided to resume his life as a bird (all babies having been birds before they were human) and never grow up.

The fairies are set into a silver plated pendant cup and encased under glass.

A silver plated feather hangs next to a green jade star. A tiny gold plated leaf lies next to the clasp.

The chain is silver plated.

Pendant: 2.5cm (1"), feather: 2.5cm (1"), chain 60cm (24")

Matching earrings available here.

Illustration: Sir Arthur Rackham.

name: I Think - Charles Darwin Necklace
description:
In mid-July 1837 Darwin started his “B” notebook on Transmutation of Species, and on page 36 wrote “I think” above the first evolutionary tree.
The text in Charles Darwin's handwriting is set into a silver plated pendant cup under glass for a quality and enduring finish. The pendant hangs from a lovely silver plated chain.
Solid sterling silver version available. Pendant: 1.5cm (5/8"), chain 45cm (18")

name: Charles Darwin Transmutation of Species Necklace
description:
In mid-July 1837 Darwin started his 'B' notebook on Transmutation of Species, and on page 36 wrote 'I think' above the first evolutionary tree.

This is a reproduction of that page in Charles Darwin's notebook in charm necklace form.

The image is encased under glass and set into a silver plated pendant cup.

The chain is silver plated.

Pendant: 2.5cm (1"), chain: 45cm (18")

More Charles Darwin here.

name: The Frog Princess Necklace
description:
Once upon a time the Princess dropped her golden ball in the pond and declared she would marry anyone who could carry it back safely to her. As fate would have it, it was a frog who returned it. Luckily, one kiss was all it took to turn her frog into a handsome prince...

The image is encased under glass and set into a silver plated pendant cup.

Hanging next to the clasp is a smaller charm showing the little frog!

The chain is silver plated.

Main pendant: 2cm (3/4"), chain: 45cm (18")

name: The Fully Illustrated and Bearded Lady Pendant
description:
Well, well.. what do we have here? What an unusual Victorian gentlewoman!

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

4cm x 5cm (1 5/8" x 2")

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Lucasie Albino Family Pendant
description:
Behold the marvelous Lucasies! A 19th century Dutch Albino family.

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

4.5cm x 2.5cm (1 3/4" x 1")

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: I Think - Charles Darwin Bicentenery Pendant
description:
In mid-July 1837 Darwin started his 'B' notebook on Transmutation of Species, and on page 36 wrote 'I think' above the first evolutionary tree.

This is a reproduction of that page in Charles Darwin's notebook in pendant form.

About 3cm x 4cm (1 2/8" x 1 1/2").

Solid sterling silver bail.

Around 4mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Charles Darwin in colour Pendant
description:
Celebrate the bicentenary of the birth of the greatest naturalist in history with this pendant.

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

4.5cm x 2.5cm (1 3/4" x 1")

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: The Thieving Magpie Necklace
description:
The notoriously kleptomaniacal magpie adorns this beautiful charm necklace.

The magpie is encased under glass for a quality and enduring finish and set into a silver plated pendant cup.

Hanging next to the charm is a silver plated feather on a chain.

A tiny solid sterling silver initial charm hangs next to the feather. Go for 'm' for magpie or personalise it with your own initial. All letters are lower-case.

Next to the clasp hangs a tiny brass key.

The charms hang from a silver plated chain.

Look closely at the magpie's beak and you will see his latest treasure; the key from the clasp!

Pendant: 3.5cm (1.5"), feather: 2.5cm (1"), chain: 60cm (24")

name: The Circus Acrobat Thaumatrope V.2
description:
A Thaumatrope is a two sided disk, usually made of paper, with one part of an image on one side, the other on the reverse. When spun, the two images combine. They were very popular in the Victorian era. If you've seen the Tim Burton film "Sleepy Hollow", Johnny Depp's character Ichabod Crane has one.

Drawing on this concept, the images here have been encased under thick plastic, framed in gilt and attached to a silver plated chain.

An acrobat is shown on one side and a horse on the other. When spun, the acrobat appears to be balancing on the horse. No mean feat!

• Please click here for a demonstration!

• Browse my other Thaumatrope designs here.

• Gilt pendant and silver plated chain.

• The pendant is about 2.5cm (1 inch) across.

Hanging next to the clasp is a tiny silver plate and glass Mymble's Daughter crow charm.

This necklace is designed to be long so you can create the illusion whilst you're wearing it. An excellent distraction in a boring class or office!

Whilst this necklace is waterproof to a certain extent, please do not wear it in the shower, expose it to condensation or submerge it in water!

Please note that the materials used to make the pendant are vintage stock and as such you may find some slight imperfections in the surface of the plastic and some unevenness to the metal frame.

This piece is quite light weight and delicate. Please take care whilst wearing it.

name: Charles Darwin Bobby Pin
description:
In mid-July 1837 Darwin started his 'B' notebook on Transmutation of Species, and on page 36 wrote 'I think' above the first evolutionary tree.

The text in Charles Darwin's original hand is set into a silver plated cups under glass.

The cup is attached to a silver plated bobby pin. The image part is 1cm (3/8") wide and the pin is around 5cm (2 inches) long.

name: The Ambiguous Skull PENDANT
description:
An ambiguous image is one that appears to be two different things at the same time. These images were particularly popular during the Victorian period. I love the macabre quality of this one.

When viewed one way this image seems to be of a skull. Look at it another way and you can see a lady sitting at a dressing table.

Clay pendant with silver plated bail.

Around 4mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

Pendant: 3cm x 5cm (1 1/4" x 2").

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Georges Méliès' Shooting Star Necklace
description:
This beautiful image of a woman dressed as a shooting star is taken from Georges Méliès' iconic 1902 film 'A Trip to the Moon'.

The image is set under glass for a quality and enduring finish and set into an antiqued silver plated pendant cup.

The pendant hangs from a silver plated chain.

Hanging next to the pendant is a tiny little mother of pearl star bead which glimmers just like the real thing.

She is the perfect wishing star. Bring a little more stardust to your life!

Pendant: 2cm (3/4"), chain: 45cm (18")

You can learn more about this iconic film and even watch it here

name: The Pussy-cat Who Went To London Necklace
description:
Pussy-cat, pussy-cat, where have you been? 'I've been to London to look at the queen.' Pussy-cat, pussy-cat, what did you there? 'I frightened a little mouse under the chair.'

Here is that little pussy-cat on his way to London...

The image is encased under glass and set into a silver plated pendant cup.

The chain is silver plated.

Pendant: 2.5cm (1"), chain: 45cm (18")

llustration by Rudyard Kipling.

name: Twinkle Twinkle Little Bat OOAK Necklace
description:
Twinkle, twinkle, little bat!
How I wonder what you're at!
Up above the world you fly,
Like a tea-tray in the sky.
Twinkle, twinkle...

The little bat from the Doormouse's sleepy song is cast here in solid lead-free pewter and hangs (upside down, of course!) from a beautiful string of hand-blown glass beads, faceted jet roundels, mother of pearl (shell) stars and both glass and real freshwater pearls.

The black and deep blue mix of colours evoke the night sky whilst the little mother of pearl stars remember the Doormouse's song.

Wear this unique necklace long around your neck with three mother of pearl stars at the nape. Those with smaller necks can even be able to wrap this twice over creating a lovely layered effect.

This piece also works wonderfully as a multi-stranded bracelet. Wrap it many times around your wrist for this look.

This design will not be repeated so don't miss your chance to own something truly special and one of a kind.

Bat: 2cm (3/4"), necklace: 88cm (35").

On Sale - Was £45

name: Personalised Victorian Alphabet Initial Necklace
description:
B is for bear, Beatrix and Belinda. H is for hedgehog, Henrietta and Helen. T is for T-Rex, Teresa and Tabatha.

Presenting the perfect charm necklace for every initial.

Choose from our full alphabet of beautiful and nostalgic Victorian images which can be seen in picture 3.

The main image is encased under glass and set into a large silver plated pendant cup.

The pendant hangs from a solid sterling silver bail.

The letter is encased in a smaller silver plate and glass charm.

The chain is solid sterling silver.

Main pendant: 2.5cm - 3cm depending on design chosen (1" - 1.25"), chain: 45cm (18")

'P is for Pigeon' and 'L is for Lark' also available.

A print version of this alphabet is available here.

name: Alice in Wonderland Quote Pendant
description:
Adorn yourself with words of wisdom from the mad world of 'Alice in Wonderland'.

This pendant features the words of the White Queen and reads:

'Sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast.'

About 3.5cm x 4.5cm (1 3/8" x 1 7/8").

Silver plated bail. Solid sterling silver option available.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Two For Joy Magpie Necklace
description:
One for sorrow. Two for joy!

A pair of Magpies you can wear to bring you joy every day.

The magpies are set into a silver plated pendant cup and encased under glass. A silver plated feather hangs next to tiny pieces of blue lace agate gemstone said to help the wearer communicate with angels. The chain is silver plated.
A solid sterling silver upgrade option is available for the chain and gemstones. Pendant: 2.5cm (1"), feather: 2.5cm (1"), chain 60cm (24") or 45cm(18") in solid sterling silver.

name: The Decision Maker Necklace - Mark II
description:
Yes or No? Or Maybe? For those questions that cannot simply be answered with a "yes" or a "no", here is a Decision Maker with a "maybe" option. Simply ask your question, spin the disk and wait for it to settle on "Yes" or "No" or "Maybe".

The spinning pendant is cast in solid sterling silver. The words are encased under glass for a quality and enduring finish.

It spins fast and freely when you give it a knock.

The chain is deliberately long so you may ask the Decision Maker questions whilst wearing it.

The pendant itself is around 2.5cm (1") tall.

It hangs from a lovely 24 inch solid sterling silver curb chain.

Hanging next to the clasp is a tiny silver plate and glass Mymble's Daughter signature crow tag.

name: The Decision Maker Necklace - Mark III
description:
Yes or No? Or Maybe?

Introducing the newest and largest edition to our bestselling Decision Maker line.

Simply ask your question, spin the disk and wait for it to settle on "Yes" or "No" or "Maybe".


The spinning pendant is cast in solid sterling silver. The words are encased under glass for a quality and enduring finish.

The chain is deliberately long so you may ask the Decision Maker questions whilst wearing it.

The pendant itself is around 3cm (1 1/4") tall.

It hangs from a lovely 24 inch solid sterling silver curb chain.

Hanging next to the clasp is a tiny silver plate and glass Mymble's Daughter signature crow tag.

Please note that this piece can be a little stiff to begin with but loosens up over time with wear.

name: P is for Pigeon Necklace
description:
P is for Pigeon is particularly perfect for Patricia, Penelope, Portia, Prudence and all other propitious persons possessing the initial of P.

The image of the magnificent pigeon is encased under glass and set into a large silver plated pendant cup which hangs from a solid sterling silver bail.

The letter 'P' is encased in a smaller glass and and solid sterling silver charm.

The chain is solid sterling silver.

This necklace has a wonderful weight to it and is perfect on its own or teamed with other pieces.

Main pendant: 2.5cm (1"), chain: 40cm (16") or 45cm (18")

Find the animal or object to match your initial here.

name: City Pigeon Necklace
description:
City pigeon knows the London tube map like the back of his wing.

The image is encased under glass and set into a large silver plated pendant cup which hangs from a solid sterling silver bail.

The chain is solid sterling silver.

Pendant: 2.5cm (1"), chain: 40cm (16") or 45cm (18")

This necklace has a wonderful weight to it and is perfect on its own or teamed with other pieces.

name: Pigeon Royalty Necklace
description:
The magnificent pigeon. Love them or hate them you are going to have to respect this one...

The image is encased under glass and set into a large silver plated pendant cup which hangs from a solid sterling silver bail.

The chain is solid sterling silver.

Pendant: 2.5cm (1"), chain: 40cm (16") or 45cm (18")

This necklace has a wonderful weight to it and is perfect on its own or teamed with other pieces.

name: The Invisible Gentleman Necklace
description:
A fine hat… or an invisible gentleman.

The image is encased under glass and set into a large silver plated pendant cup which hangs from a solid sterling silver bail.

The chain is solid sterling silver.

Pendant: 2.5cm (1"), chain: 40cm (16") or 45cm (18")

This necklace has a wonderful weight to it and is perfect for the office!

name: Charles Dickens Quote Pendant
description:
Adorn yourself with words of wisdom from some of the greatest minds the world has ever known.

This pendant features the words of Victorian author Charles Dickens and reads: 'Never do tomorrow what you can do today. Procrastination is the thief of time.'

About 3.5cm x 4.5cm (1 3/8" x 1 7/8").

Solid sterling silver bail.

Around 4mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Charles Darwin 'I Think' Earrings
description:
In mid-July 1837 Darwin started his 'B' notebook on Transmutation of Species, and on page 36 wrote 'I think' above the first evolutionary tree.

The text in Charles Darwin's original hand is set into two silver plated cups under glass.

These earrings are silver plated and for pierced ears.

Image: 1cm (3/8").

name: Edgar Allan Poe Quote Pendant
description:
Adorn yourself with words of wisdom from some of the greatest minds the world has ever known.

This pendant features one of Edgar Allan Poe's excellently pointed comments and reads: 'I became insane with long intervals of horrible sanity.'

About 3.5cm x 4.5cm (1 3/8" x 1 7/8").

Solid sterling silver bail.

Around 4mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Oscar Wilde Quote Pendant
description:
Adorn yourself with words of wisdom from some of the greatest minds the world has ever known.
Choose from three of Oscar Wilde's excellent witticisms: A: 'Life is too important to be taken seriously.' B: 'A poet can survive everything but a misprint.' C: 'Conversation about the weather is the last refuge of the unimaginative.'

About 3.5cm x 4.5cm (1 3/8" x 1 7/8").

Silver plated bail.

Around 4mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: The Eye Chart Pendant
description:
Simultaneously striking and subtle, the classic eye chart format is the perfect design for words as curious and thought-provoking as these.

At first, this pendant gives the impression of chic optical interest, but on closer inspection, a quote is revealed to anyone you allow to peer at your neck for long enough!

Choose from Edgar Allan Poe: 'All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.'

Oscar Wilde: 'Illusion is the first of all pleasures.'

Or George Bernard Shaw: 'Better see rightly on a pound than squint on a million.'

About 3.5cm x 5.5cm (1 3/8" x 2 2/8").

Solid sterling silver bail.

Around 3mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Little Red Riding Hood Pendant
description:
I love this painting of Little Red Riding Hood. She's just as I imagined her, all ready to take the basket of treats though the forest to her granny...
About 2.5cm x 3cm (1" x 1 1/4"). Hangs from a silver plated spring bail. Around 4mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay. Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

Illustration by John Everett Millais.

name: Peter and the Wolf Necklace
description:
Peter is trying to escape the jaws of the hungry wolf by climbing up the side of this necklace whilst his friend the little bird flutters just out of reach on the other side.

Look closely and you will see the wolf has already eaten the unfortunate goose, but in his hurry he ate him whole and alive! Listen carefully and you may just hear him squabbling!

Peter, the wolf and the bird are hand-cut from thick black plastic and hang from a black plated nickel necklace.

The largest piece is the wolf at 7cm long (2 3/4"). He hangs at the base of the necklace, snapping at the heels of Peter.

Peter is 4.5 cm tall (1 3/4") and the bird is just 1.5cm (1/2").

The goose is actually cut out of the wolf with the colour of your skin bringing him to life when worn.

The necklace is about 20 inches long.


The necklace fastens with a black plated clasp. Next to the clasp hangs a tiny glass and silver plate Mymble's Daughter crow charm. This one's extra special as he's white on a black background - the reverse of my usual tag.

Peter and the bird have a tendency to flip over whilst the necklace is being worn which is great because it's like the scene is moving. All pieces are double sided so they look fine on whichever side they end up on.

The plastic pieces are very strong but this is an art piece and care should be taken whilst wearing it.

Inspired by the wonderful Prokofiev composition, Peter and the Wolf. Learn more about it here.

name: The Pussy-cat Who Went To London Pendant
description:
Pussy-cat, pussy-cat, where have you been? "I've been to London to look at the queen." Pussy-cat, pussy-cat, what did you there? "I frightened a little mouse under the chair."

Here is that little pussy-cat on his way to London...

About 3cm x 4cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/2"). Hangs from a silver plated spring bail. Around 4mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: The Bearded Lady Pendant
description:
Well, well.. what do we have here? Look closely and you will see a rather unusual Victorian couple.

The Portable Cabinet of Curiosities Collection presents...

The Bearded Lady!


About 2.5cm x 3.5cm (1" x 1 3/8").

Hangs from a silver plated spring bail.

Around 4mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Alice in Wonderland Pendant - The Secret Door
description:
Alice came upon a low curtain she had not noticed before, and behind it was a little door about fifteen inches high: she tried the little key in the lock, and to her great delight it fitted!"

== Lewis Carroll ==


The pendant is about 3cm x 3cm (1 1/8" x 1 1/8") and hangs from a silver plated bail.

A tiny golden key hangs from a chain behind the main charm. A tiny glass and silver plate charm holds the image of the White Rabbit and hangs from the top. All findings and the chain are silver plated and the tiny key is gold plated.
Around 4mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay. Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day. The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.
Illustrations by Sir John Tenniel.

name: Thaumatrope Illusion Necklace
description:
A Thaumatrope is a two sided disk, usually made of paper, with one part of an image on one side, the other on the reverse. When spun, the two images combine. They were very popular in the Victorian era. If you've seen the Tim Burton film 'Sleepy Hollow', Johnny Depp's character Ichabod Crane has one.

Drawing on this concept, the images here have been encased under thick plastic, framed in gilt and attached to a silver plated chain.

It works just like a regular Thaumatrope; spin the pendant and the bird appears inside the cage! Stop the spinning and you will see the bird has cleverly escaped...

• Please click here for a demonstration!

• Browse my other Thaumatrope designs here.

• Gilt pendant and silver plated chain.

Pendant: 2.5cm (1"), chain: 65cm (24")


Hanging next to the clasp is a tiny silver plate and glass Mymble's Daughter crow charm.

This necklace is designed to be long so you can create the illusion whilst you're wearing it. An excellent distraction in a boring class or office!

Whilst this necklace is waterproof to a certain extent, please do not wear it in the shower, expose it to condensation or submerge it in water!

Please note that the materials used to make the pendant are vintage stock and as such you may find some slight imperfections in the surface of the plastic and some unevenness to the metal frame.

This piece is quite light weight and delicate. Please take care whilst wearing it.

name: The Legend of Sleepy Hollow Thaumatrope Necklace
description:
A Thaumatrope is a two sided disk, usually made of paper, with one part of an image on one side, the other on the reverse. When spun, the two images combine. They were very popular in the Victorian era.

If you've seen the Tim Burton film "Sleepy Hollow", Johnny Depp's character Ichabod Crane has one just like this.

Drawing on this concept, this vintage optical lens has been hand-painted with a cardinal on one side and an empty bird cage on the other.

It works just like a regular Thaumatrope - spin the pendant and the bird appears inside the cage! Stop the spinning and you will see the bird has cleverly escaped...

• Please click here for a demonstration!

• Browse my other Thaumatrope designs here.

• The chain is aged silver plate and 24 inches long.

• The pendant is about 4cm (1.5 inches) across and made from a silver-coloured metal.

• The main body of the pendant is glass onto which acrylic paints have been applied and then sealed with artists varnish.

This necklace is designed to be long so you can create the illusion whilst you're wearing it.

Wear it as regular necklace or clasp it in a different way to create a longer, drop-down effect as seen in photograph 4.

You could even wear it fob-watch style by stringing it through a button-hole and clasping it to your pocket.

Whilst this necklace is waterproof to a certain extent, please do not wear it in the shower, expose it to condensation or submerge it in water!

Please note that the materials used to make the pendant are vintage stock. It is also hand-painted and intentionally distressed. As such you may find some slight imperfections which surely add to its charm.

This necklace is a delicate art piece. Please take care whilst wearing it.

name: Bird Watching Print - Blackcap & Alpine Accentor
description:
These little birds form part of my Field Notes on British Birds series. These are individual birds that are part of my life. I have observed their different characters over time and tried to capture them here in my portraits of them.

At first glance these may look like regular field notes, but look closely and you will see the notes are rather unusual...

The Blackcap and his little wife visit the plum tree outside my window each year. I am always surprised by his beautiful song which he sings whilst he searches for the most delicious fruits.

The Alpine Accentor lives at the top of a mountain near Abergavenny. He's always waiting for me each time I visit. He loves to hop around the rocks and heather before ascending straight up into the sky. The view must be amazing.

Reproduction rights are not transferred with the sale and the watermark will not appear on the print you receive.
➵ This print is reproduced from my original drawings using archival quality inks. ➵ The paper is a wonderful handmade English artist's watercolour paper. ➵ The print is carefully hand- torn and incorporates the beautiful rough edges created during the paper-making process. ➵ It is around A4 size: 21cm × 30cm or 8 inches x 12 inches. ➵ Signed in pencil by the artist.

name: Bird Watching Print - Dunnock & Goldcrest
description:
These little birds form part of my Field Notes on British Birds series. These are individual birds that are part of my life. I have observed their different characters over time and tried to capture them here in my portraits of them.

At first glance these may look like regular field notes, but look closely and you will see the notes are rather unusual...

The Dunnock is my favourite because she always looks so endearingly worried. After weeks of working up her courage, she is finally brave enough to make it up to my window-mounted bird-feeder for seeds.

The Goldcrest is the tiniest of all British birds. Friendly, round and bouncy like a wren, but with a fancy yellow hat!

Reproduction rights are not transferred with the sale and the watermark will not appear on the print you receive.
➵ This print is reproduced from my original drawings using archival quality inks. ➵ The paper is a wonderful handmade English artist's watercolour paper. ➵ The print is carefully hand- torn and incorporates the beautiful rough edges created during the paper-making process. ➵ It is around A4 size: 21cm × 30cm or 8 inches x 12 inches. ➵ Signed in pencil by the artist.

name: Steampunk Necklace Number VI
description:
The Portable Curiosity Cabinet Collection presents...

Necklace Number V1 (6). It is ready to contain whatever you think belongs inside its tiny glass specimen tube. A hand-written note, beads, silence, whatever takes your fancy...


The glass vial is just over 2.5cm (1 inch) tall and is sealed with a real cork (removable).

Hanging from the cork is a tiny glass and silver plate label which reads "VI" in hand-drawn lettering.

Perfect for the man or woman about town!

name: The Empty Birdcage Locket
description:
This birdcage is empty. But can you spot the naughty escapee?

The silhouetted image of a birdcage is set into a silver plated locket under glass for a quality and enduring finish.

The image part of the locket is just under 2cm tall (6/8").

The locket is beautifully detailed both inside and out and around 3.5 cm tall overall (1 1/4").

It opens to reveal the bird that flew away! This little bird is just 8mm tall (3/8") and is also encased under glass.

There's plenty of room on the other side for your own photograph too, should you wish to add one.

Hanging next to the clasp is a tiny silver plate and glass charm featuring another little Mymble's Daughter crow. A friend for the bird inside the locket!

This necklace is available in either white cage on black or black cage on white. The bird inside is the opposite colourway to the image on the front.

name: Signature Bird Pendant
description:
The Mymble's Daughter signature crow has found his way onto this striking pendant.
About 3cm x 3cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/4"). Hangs from a silver plated spring bail. Around 4mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay. Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.
The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Thaumatrope Illusion Necklace - Steampunk Edition
description:
A Thaumatrope is a two sided disk, usually made of paper, with one part of an image on one side, the other on the reverse. When spun, the two images combine. They were very popular in the Victorian era. If you've seen the Tim Burton film "Sleepy Hollow", Johnny Depp's character Ichabod Crane has one.

Drawing on this concept, the images here have been encased under thick plastic, framed in gold plate and attached to a gold plated chain.

It works just like a regular Thaumatrope - spin the pendant and the bird appears inside the cage! Stop the spinning and you will see the bird has cleverly escaped...

• Please click here for a demonstration!

• Browse my other Thaumatrope designs here.

• All findings and chain are gold plated.

• The pendant is about 2.5cm (1 inch) across.


Hanging next to the clasp is a tiny gold plate and glass Mymble's Daughter crow charm.

This necklace is designed to be long so you can create the illusion whilst you're wearing it. An excellent distraction in a boring class or office!

Whilst this necklace is waterproof to a certain extent, please do not wear it in the shower, expose it to condensation or submerge it in water!

Please note that the materials used to make the pendant are vintage stock and as such you may find some slight imperfections in the surface of the plastic and some unevenness to the metal frame.

This piece is quite light weight and delicate. Please take care whilst wearing it.

name: Alice in Wonderland Necklace - The Mad Hatter
description:
"The first witness was the Hatter. He came in with a teacup in one hand and a piece of bread-and-butter in the other. ‘I beg pardon, your Majesty,’ he began, ‘for bringing these in: but I hadn’t quite finished my tea when I was sent for."

== Lewis Carroll ==


A silver plate and glass charm bears the legend "In this style 10/6". For all you Mad Hatters out there...

The charm itself is quite small at just over 1cm tall (about 1/2 inch).

All findings are silver plated.

The pendant hangs from a silver plated chain.

name: The Bird & the Empty Cage Bobby Pins
description:
One pin shows an empty cage, the other the naughty escapee.
The images are set into solid sterling silver cups under glass for a quality and enduring finish. The cups are attached to silver plated bobby pins. The image parts are 1cm (3/8") wide and the pins are around 5cm (2 inches) long. The pins are presented on a pretty little hand-stamped card. Great for gift giving.

name: Bird Watching Print - The Goldcrest in Flight
description:
These little birds form part of my Field Notes on British Birds series. These are individual birds that are part of my life. I have observed their different characters over time and tried to capture them here in my portraits of them.
➵ This print is reproduced from my original drawings using archival quality inks. ➵ The paper is a wonderful super-matte cardstock. ➵ The print is about 6" x 6" (15cm x 15cm). ➵ Signed in pencil by the artist. The Goldcrest is the tiniest of all British birds but just look at him go!
Reproduction rights are not transferred with the sale and the watermark will not appear on the print you receive.

name: Alice in Wonderland Pendant - Down the Rabbit Hole
description:
"The rabbit-hole went straight on like a tunnel for some way, and then dipped suddenly down, so suddenly that Alice had not a moment to think about stopping herself before she found herself falling down what seemed to be a very deep well."

== Lewis Carroll ==

About 3cm x 4cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/2"). Hanging from top of the pendant is a tiny cameo in a silver plated cup and Alice's tiny golden key. Around 4mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay.

Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

Hangs from a silver plated spring bail.

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

Illustration by Sir John Tenniel.

name: Bird Watching Print - The Juvenile Robin
description:
These little birds form part of my Field Notes on British Birds series. These are individual birds that are part of my life. I have observed their different characters over time and tried to capture them here in my portraits of them.
➵ This print is reproduced from my original drawings using archival quality inks. ➵ The paper is a wonderful handmade English artist's watercolour paper. ➵ The print is carefully hand- torn and incorporates the beautiful rough edges created during the paper-making process. ➵ It is about 18cm x 13cm (7 inches x 5 inches). ➵ Signed in pencil by the artist.

Here's the juvenile robin. So very small and fluffy, he's only just got his proper flying feathers and he's very proud of them. He may still be brown and speckled with no red breast, but I love him just the way he is.

Reproduction rights are not transferred with the sale and the watermark will not appear on the print you receive.

name: The Empty Birdcage Necklace
description:
This birdcage is empty. But can you spot the naughty escapee?

Available in white on black and black on white colourways.

Choose from two chain lengths.

The image is sealed under a glass cap for a quality and enduring finish and is set into a silver plated pendant cup.

The pendant hangs from a silver plated chain.

Hanging next to the clasp is my tiny Mymble's Daughter crow tag

Pendant: 2cm (3/4"), chain: 45cm (18") or 60cm (24")

name: Victorian Bird's Egg Locket - The Goldfinch
description:
I have always loved the colour plates in my antique bird books. The ones of bird eggs are especially beautiful. There's something about the old inks and printing process that captures the delicate quality of the eggs perfectly.

This locket shows the Goldfinch's egg. I have scanned the image directly from an antique Victorian print and which has retained the lovely delicate quality of the original.

The legend underneath reads "Goldfinch" so you wont forget which bird this pretty little speckled egg belongs to.

The pendant hangs from a silver plated chain.

Hanging next to the clasp is a tiny silver plate and glass charm featuring another little Mymble's Daughter crow. A friend for the bird inside the locket!

The image of the egg is set into a silver plated locket under glass for a quality and enduring finish. The image part of the locket is just under 2cm tall (6/8"). The locket is beautifully detailed both inside and out and around 3.5 cm tall overall (1 1/4"). It opens to reveal a bird! This little bird is just 8mm tall (3/8") and is also encased under glass. There's plenty of room on the other side for your own photograph too, should you wish to add one.

name: The Mad Hatter's Tea Party Invitations - SET of 4
description:
Why not host your very own Mad Hatter's Tea Party? ➵ Printed with archival inks on highest quality cardstock. ➵ Corners are rounded for a nice finish. ➵ Each card is 8.5cm by 13cm (3 3/8" x 5"). ➵ Each card comes with a beautiful French envelope. There's space for you to write whose party it is, where it is and at what time. The back of the cards are coloured a lovely cream like the background of the image and left blank for all the other details you might like to include for your lucky party invitees. They are correspondence cards so they don't open. Think of them as very fancy postcards.

"The table was a large one, but the three were all crowded together at one corner of it: `No room! No room!' they cried out when they saw Alice coming. `There's plenty of room!' said Alice indignantly, and she sat down in a large arm-chair at one end of the table."

== Lewis Carroll ==

for a set of 4

name: Alice in Wonderland Pendant - Drink Me
description:
"Tied round the neck of the bottle was a paper label, with the words 'DRINK ME' beautifully printed on it in large letters... so Alice ventured to taste it, and, finding it very nice, she very soon finished it off..."

== Lewis Carroll ==

About 3cm x 4cm (1 1/4" x 1 1/2") not including key. About 5.5cm (2 2/8") overall. Hangs from a silver plated pendant loop which is also decorated with a tiny and very detailed little cameo charm in a silver plated case.. Around 4mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay. Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.

This pendant is available in both Gothic Lolita Black and original Blue.

Hanging from the pendant is a silver key charm. Oh no, I think it's the one Alice left behind her on the table when she shrank!

The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

Original illustration by Sir John Tenniel. Hand-coloured by The Mymble's Daughter.

name: Signature Bird Necklace
description:
Presenting my signature necklace - a larger version of the tiny little crow charm you will sometimes see on my necklaces and bracelets - it's on this one too!
The images are sealed under glass for a quality and enduring finish. Available in silver plated and solid sterling silver finishes.

Choose from black on white or white on black colourways.

Bird Pendant: 2cm (3/4"), Chain: 45cm (18")

name: Alice in Wonderland Bobby Pins
description:
Tiny versions of the original Alice in Wonderland illustrations adorn these pretty little pins.

One shows Alice and the piglet, another Alice at the Mad Hatter's Tea Party and the other Alice with the pack of cards flying into the air at the end of the story.


The images are set into solid sterling silver cups under glass for a quality and enduring finish.

The cups are attached to silver plated bobby pins. The image parts are 1cm (3/8") wide and the pins are around 5cm (2 inches) long.

The pins are presented on a pretty little hand-stamped card. Great for gift giving.

Illustrations by Sir John Tenniel.

name: Shall We Dance Pendant
description:
I absolutely love this image. It's so romantic...
About 3cm x 2.5cm (1 1/4" x 1"). Hangs from a silver plated spring bail. Around 4mm thick (about 1/8 inch) and made from my own blend of clay. Lightweight, waterproof, durable and easy to wear. Perfect for every day.
The ribbon shown in the photographs is not included. Choose a ribbon or chain for your pendant here.

name: Marie Antoinette Pearl Necklace
description:
Oh, so chic and mysterious! Be the belle of the ball with this stunning pearl necklace.
The charm depicting Marie Antoinette in her masquerade mask is a magnificently large 2 inches tall. The extremely detailed image is encased under a high dome of glass for a quality and enduring finish and has a wonderful weight to it. The charm hangs from a stunning string of genuine champagne-coloured freshwater pearls. The string fastens with a silver clasp set with turquoise, flanked with tiny glass pearls for a comfortable fit. All findings are silver plated. These pearls will come to you inside a beautiful, highest quality, black velvet-covered case with white satin lining. Fit for a Queen!
The size of the pearls on this piece may vary ever so slightly depending on current stock but the length will always be constant.

name: Any Colour Ribbon Necklace - 16 inches
description:
String your pendant onto a satin ribbon necklace. The clasps are silver plated. ➵ The ribbon is 3mm thick (1/8 inch) and the necklace is about 16 inches long. ➵ It fits easily onto all of our pendants. Why not buy more than one colour to mix and match according to your outfit? ➵ Solid sterling silver findings are also available here.
➵ Please specify which colour you would like to the right:

➵ Please take a look at our pendants section to find your perfect pendant match for this ribbon necklace.

description:
String your pendant onto a satin ribbon necklace. The clasps are silver plated. ➵ The ribbon is 3mm thick (1/8 inch) and the necklace is about 16 inches long. ➵ It fits easily onto all of our pendants. Why not buy more than one colour to mix and match according to your outfit? ➵ Solid sterling silver findings are also available here.
➵ Please specify which colour you would like to the right:

name: Silver Plated Chain Necklace
description: String your pendant onto a beautiful silver plated trace chain necklace. ➵ It fits easily onto all of our pendants. Why not buy more than one colour to mix and match according to your outfit? ➵ Please take a look at our pendants section to find your perfect pendant match for this ribbon necklace.

name: Animal & Bird Bookplates in SETS of 8
description:
These are perfect for textbooks, recipe books and your most precious of books.

Or why not include one of these when giving a book as a gift?

➵ Designs "E" and "H" are about 8cm x 6cm (3" x 2.5").

➵ Design "F" is about 6cm x 6cm (2.5" x 2.5").

➵ Design "G" is about 5cm x 4cm (2" x 1.5").

➵ All show the same design except for the "Little Birds" set which is assorted.

➵ The images are printed using archival quality ink and the labels are self-adhesive. Simply peel off the backing and stick into the book of your choice.

➵ They come supplied in a self-seal plastic bag.

for a set of 8
